vizïƒ

class viz.Viz(ax=None, fig=None)[source]ïƒ

Bases: _PlotMixin, _LayoutMixin, _VizCore

Viz class for plotting on a matplotlib axis.

Parameters:

  • ax (matplotlib.axes.Axes) â€“ The axis on which the plot will be drawn.

  • fig (matplotlib.figure.Figure, optional) â€“ The figure containing the axis. Defaults to None, in which case ax.figure is used.

add_subplot(*args, \*\*kwargs)ïƒ

Adds a new subplot to the figure.
